name: Back in Lab
description:
-- OVERVIEW --

This is Back In Lab, you play as a scientist who made a Time Rewind Watch, but the company which gave you that task wants to use it for evil. Your goal is to made it to the end of this weird Laboratory while solving puzzles, opening doors and dodging projectiles with the power of your watch.

--INFO--

+ Move with the A and D keys or RIGHT and LEFT arrows (There's a typo on the help screen of the game, sorry)
+ Jump with SPACE key
+ Rewind Time with SHIFT
+ The game has 6 levels
+ The rewind mechanic affects the world but it doesn't affects you, so you can use this to your advantage to use the world in different points in time

--CREDITS--

Developed by SoyVixterDev and PauloWgg for the Brackeys GameJam 2020.2

Link to SoyVixterDev page: https://soyvixterdev.itch.io/

Every asset, code, sound effect and music was made during the jam.
